title: sportsbet.io
author: sportsbet.io
content: Southampton vs Arsenal > 2 chances to WIN!    Bitcointalk Promotion ONLY     Free Entry & Win Stuff!SIMPLY nominate your predicted Correct Score for the Southampton vs Arsenal match in the EPL on Sunday!![/u]    All correct entries will receive 3x 1 mbtc Free bets    Wait, we have more!!As main front-of-shirt sponsors of Southampton, it's only fair we put up some 2022/23 Southampton Merchandise for this match!We are backing in Southampton to Score!! >> So if you want to be in the running to win some merch, ADD THE TIME OF SOUTHAMPTON'S FIRST GOAL to your correct score nomination.. If you are within 5 minutes either side of Southampton's first goal.. you will win a Southampton shirt of your choice! (Home/Away/3rd Shirt)(Even if you don't get the correct score right, you are in the running for the shirt!!)A great example of an entry:Match Score: 1-3.SH 1st goal: 52nd minute.GOOD LUCK and share with friends!regards,Steve.Sportsbet.ioTerms and Conditions:1.Please submit before kick-off, 1 entry per person.2.Winners need to have a sportsbet.io account and winnings will be paid in mbtc free bets. Not exchangeable for cash.3.(no goal) for Southampton will be accepted as a time of goal - Ill pay out on the first 5 minutes and last 5 minutes of the timed match if Southampton fail to Score.4.I'm hosting some customers in Melbourne at the World Cup of Cricket so I may be a touch slow on the replies > Jeremypwr can answer any questions in my absence.5.Winners, pls PM Jeremypwr with sportsbet.io user names and if you win the merchandise, please also msg with your preferred shirt style + SIZE. I will then contact you back for postage details.6.I'll pay out all free bets by 1800 GMT Time Monday night, please have your information to me by then, many thanks!
